remarks: The predicate "is a commutative ring".  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 8-Jun-2010.)
statement:
iscring2.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
iscring2.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
iscring2.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
iscrngo2 $p |- ( R e. CRingOps <-> ( R e. RingOps /\ A. x e. X A. y e. X ( x H y ) = ( y H x ) ) ) $.
$d R x y $.
$d X x y $.
